entry.title: Entry #33 in Chabon v. OpenAI, Inc., 3:23-cv-04625
entry.summary: Transcript of Proceedings held on December 7, 2023, before Judge Araceli Martinez-Olguin. Court Reporter Ana Dub, CSR 7445, RDR, RMR, CRR, CCRR, CRG, CCG, telephone number 415-290-1651; ana_dub@cand.uscourts.gov. Per General Order No. 59 and Judicial Conference policy, this transcript may be viewed only at the Clerk's Office public terminal or may be purchased through the Court Reporter until the deadline for the Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date, it may be obtained through PACER. Any Notice of Intent to Request Redaction, if required, is due no later than 5 business days from date of this filing. (Re (87 in 3:23-cv-03223-AMO) Transcript Order ) Release of Transcript Restriction set for 3/11/2024. (amd, COURT STAFF) (Filed on 12/11/2023) (Entered: 12/11/2023)
